title: ‘We See Immense Talent:’ Ashlin Barry on Fast-Track to WorldTour with Visma-Lease a Bike
content:
North America’s most promising road racing talent signs on with Dutch super team’s junior squad for 2025: 'It’s incredibly inspiring to sign with the same team as riders like Wout van Aert and Jonas Vingegaard.'

Read the full article at ‘We See Immense Talent:’ Ashlin Barry on Fast-Track to WorldTour with Visma-Lease a Bike on Velo.
author: ahood
